attributes.action: transfer the annual payment of road tax to petrol costs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By charging car tax through petrol forecourt cost. The most environmentally friendly car will pay less than the large cars. There would be a very little difference in cost per litre and there would be no road tax dodgers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
